Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: ALL NATURAL WITCH HAZEL (CONTAINING NATURAL GRAIN ALCOHOL 14%), BENZETHONIUM CHLORIDE, SODIUM BENZOATE, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Im
ncer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
